a57b0cb3-6bad-4a2a-94bd-3a9a85c22b59.label: Ulman revealed that her early reliance on meticulously scripted formats, such as PowerPoint presentations for artist talks, stemmed from her autism and was a strategy to maintain composure and control during public appearances. These initial scripts evolved into video essays that allowed her to be in charge of her narrative and became recognized artworks in themselves.
a57b0cb3-6bad-4a2a-94bd-3a9a85c22b59.file_url: Neurodivergence and Scripted Performance | Video Essays
